name: Leadership Essentials
description: Develop the essential skills to lead teams and inspire others.

levels.title: Self-Leadership
levels.description: Before leading others, you must lead yourself. Focus on time management, emotional regulation, and integrity.
practices: Set personal goals and track progress weekly

levels.title: Team Motivation
levels.objective: Inspire and motivate team members to achieve common goals.
levels.description: Learn understand what drives different individuals. Practice recognition, constructive feedback, and delegation.
practices: Give specific, positive feedback to a colleague daily
Practice delegating tasks with clear instructions
Hold 1-on-1 meetings focused on career development

levels.title: Strategic Vision
levels.objective: Set a clear vision and guide the team towards long-term success.
levels.description: Develop strategic thinking skills. Learn to communicate a compelling vision and align team efforts with organizational goals.
practices: Create a 1-year roadmap for a personal or work project
Analyze industry trends and share insights with the team
